about_the_game:
"Can you find thy way to Vagrant Moon, resting sweetly where the high clouds bloom?"


Vagrant Moon is a charming 3D platformer that captures the classic feel and simplicity of PS1-era games. Developed by a passionate solo game developer, this game invites you on a serene treasure hunt through its vibrant landscapes, where every treasure, from mystical crystals to radiant gemstones, not only gently enhances your abilities but also unlocks new areas of the enchanted valley to explore, deepening the mystery of your journey.


Key Features:

  • Echoes of the Golden Era: Inspired by the old-school design of PS1 and PS2 platformers, where exploration and discovery lead the adventure.
  • Ability Progression System: Collect crystals to level up Rinu, enhancing your ability to explore further and reach new heights.
  • Mystical Gemstone Gateways: Search for hidden gemstones that are essential for unlocking gateways to new areas.
  • Uncover Veiled Secrets: Scout out and break through deceptive walls to reveal the secrets they hide.
  • Open Serene Exploration: Delight in a relaxing, non-linear adventure that unfolds at your own pace. Unwind in the tranquility of a world with no adversaries, allowing you to leisurely explore its every nook.
  • Leap Mastery: Navigate through critical jumping sections where careful timing and thoughtful leaps make all the difference.
  • Mysterious Guide: Follow the enigmatic moon that moves through the sky, guiding you subtly toward the ultimate goal atop the clouds.
